practiceAreas: Personal Injury|Medical Malpractice|Worker's Compensation|Connecticut Casino Injury Cases
description:
At Law Office of Toby M. Schaffer, Personal Injury Attorney Toby Schaffer is able to offer you the comfort of a reliable opinion and serious legal help. Our attorneys can tell you if you have a case. For immediate assistance, please call 203-977-2402.

Our attorneys have successfully represented personal injury victims in many accident cases throughout Connecticut and New York. Our knowledge, skills, and experience may help you recover the compensation which you may be entitled to after being involved in an accident or losing a family member in a fatal crash.

If we determine that you do have a case, we will do whatever it takes - including going all the way to court - to ensure that you are awarded the compensation you deserve.
